views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, iOS 9 and iOS 10.

PassButtonStyle gives you the option to change Different Styles View to the PassCode Buttons.

You can choose from multiple graphic Buttons to apply without the needing of the Respring.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Version 1.0.5 - Added the option to Remove the Blur from the PassCode Screen (tip by sinfool). Version 1.0.4 - Added the option to Make Oval the PassCode Buttons. - Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate me (thanks) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel. - Changes in Labels Description in Prefs. Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Remove the Touch ID or Enter Passcode Text on the LockScreen Passcode.
- Small Code Improvement.
Version 0.0.1-2
- Added the option to make Lighter and Sleek the Tint of the LS PassCode (incorporation of PassCodeTintLight on my Personal Repository).
- Added the option to remove the Emergency Button on the LS PassCode (incorporation of NoEmergencyButton on my Personal Repository).
